Job Title: Digital Website Specialist

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
Hunter Douglas is the world’s leading manufacturer of window coverings and a major manufacturer of architectural products. We are a brand that you know and trust. With more than 100 years of innovation, we’ve defined our industry with proprietary products that deliver revolutionary style and functionality and can be found in millions of homes and commercial buildings globally.

We are searching for candidates that are driven, intelligent, creative, and entrepreneurial. By offering challenging and accelerated opportunities for growth, powered by a shared hunger for success, we create a space for your career to thrive. In return for your expertise, we are committed to providing competitive and robust total compensation and benefit packages to ensure you feel valued. Our dream is to become the fastest growing, most loved, window covering company in the world. What’s yours?

Position Overview

A premium, intelligent window fashions company is looking for a highly motivated problem-solver to create and maintain website content while supporting the business objectives. They will collaborate with the director of optimization, internal team, business stakeholders and external partners. Site maintenance is conducted on the AEM platform. Adherence to site brand standards while evolving the digital experience.

What You'll Do

Accountable for the maintenance of digital content, functionality and development support for hunterdouglas.com. Work with a team to utilize Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) to implement UX and content updates.Be the first lieutenant for the Director of Site Optimization and Strategy to deliver on all key business metrics by managing website-related projects and initiatives.Deliver website performance reports and insights, informing ongoing work processes and strategy and to facilitate discussion of strategic initiatives.Identify site optimization opportunities for business KPIs by evaluating metrics and insights.Size, scope and recommend content/UX testing opportunities, which should include a business case, an execution plan and stakeholder buy-in.Create and execute tests and campaigns using Adobe, VWO, Userlytics or another website testing solution, enlisting development resources for more complicated functional test treatments.Support IT-related undertakings by capturing clear business requirements, provision of functional deliverables, milestone planning and project post-mortem reports.Ensure best practices across website efforts by developing and maintaining plans and managing allocated resources.All other duties as assigned


Who You Are

5+ years experience in consumer-facing web operations/marketing roles, a premium/luxury brand a plus.BS or BFA in Art/Design or other related design discipline preferredRecent familiarity and experience managing a CMS (AEM desired).Experience with Adobe XD, Figma, or Sketch requiredAdobe Creative Cloud Experience requiredRelevant experience working with web analytics, personalization and testing tools. Experience with at least one web analytics tool (Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics, or similar) and one testing tool (Target, VWO or similar) required.Please include a portfolio link in the cover letter section or on the resume


What's In It For You

Annual base salary range: $73,000.00-82,000.00Bonus target range: 10-20%Generous benefits package including medical, dental, vision, life, disabilityA company culture that prioritizes internal development and professional growthTime off with pay 401(k) plan with a degree of employer matchingPaid parental leaveWellness programs and product discountsRemote Role


Please note, all offers presented to candidates are carefully crafted to ensure market competitiveness, equity, and reflect the individual candidate’s education, experience, skills and potential.

Hunter Douglas is an Equal Opportunity Employer and complies with applicable employment laws. EOE/M/F/Vet/Disabled are encouraged to apply.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
